short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to select GitHub PR templates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As monorepos have become more common, the need for an easy way to select a PR template seems to have been overlooked by GitHub. This extension solves that.
